parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client-generated token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. Make sure that the token is unique for each request. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The new remark. To clear the remark, set this parameter to an empty string.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the zone.
